statements: DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE treatment_type = 'Chemotherapy' AND trial_end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clinical_trials WHERE trial_id = 1001 AND research_site = 'Hospital A';
DELETE FROM research_studies WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE patient_id = 101 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ResearchStudies WHERE study_name = 'COVID-19 Study' AND start_date > '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age >= 60 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM treatments WHERE side_effects LIKE '%nausea%'
